title: Unmark problems in FontLab?
content:
Is there a way to make the opposite of mark problems macro?  
That is, take away the marked problems so every glyph window will be white again.
author: Goran Soderstrom

comments.content:
select all glyphs then control click Mac or right-mouse click PC and get the pop-up contexual menu; scroll down to Mark color and select "none"

ChrisL
Once again, you jump in and save my day. Thanks Maestro Chris.
